#summary How to compile H2Sharp

H2Sharp can be built on all the platforms supported by MonoDevelop.

However so far it seems to work well only on Microsoft .NET (hence, on Windows).

  * On Unix / MacOS X : Install [http://www.mono-project.com/Main_Page Mono] and [http://monodevelop.com/ MonoDevelop]
  * On Windows : Install the free [http://msdn.microsoft.com/fr-fr/express/aa975050.aspx Visual C# 2008 Express Edition] (not tested yet with [http://www.microsoft.com/express/ 2010])
  * Install [http://www.ikvm.net/ IKVM.NET] and set the IKVM_HOME environment variable to its main directory (should have a 'bin' sub-directory)
  * [http://code.google.com/p/h2sharp/source/checkout Checkout H2Sharp]
  * Open h2sharp/H2Sharp/H2Sharp.sln with MonoDevelop or Visual C++ and build
